DOC.brief_summary: This cross-sectional observational study . For participant resident Adelaide , South Australia . The study consist 3 visit Pain Anaesthesia Research Clinic ( PARC ) , within Royal Adelaide Hospital ( RAH ) . A total 56 participant recruit study .
DOC.brief_title: The Progression From Dysmenorrhoea Chronic Pelvic Pain
DOC.detailed_description: The study involve screen visit follow two visit PARC blood sample questionnaire . At baseline visit , blood sample ass biomarkers confirm hormonal status take . From screen final study visit total approximately 120 mL blood sample take participant . The study aim knowledge presence severe pelvic pain young woman area under-researched regard 's impact society . The study propose enroll 7 group 8 healthy nulliparous woman age 18-35 follow characteristic : Mild absent dysmenorrhoea ( pain scale 0-3 ) pelvic pain symptom . ( 3 group ) - Group 1 , without contraceptive pill use - Group 2A , contraceptive pill user history mild absent dysmenorrhoea prior pill use - Group 2B , contraceptive pill user history severe dysmenorrhoea ( pain scale 7-10 ) prior pill use Severe dysmenorrhoea ( pain scale 7-10 ) , without chronic pelvic pain . ( 2 group ) - Group 3 , without contraceptive pill use - Group 4 , contraceptive pill user Chronic pelvic pain severe dysmenorrhoea ( 2 group ) - Group 5 , without contraceptive pill use - Group 6 , contraceptive pill user
DOC.criteria: Age 16 35 year old Irregular menstrual cycle Use reproductive hormonal preparation ( combined oral contraceptive pill ) , thyroxine , insulin corticosteroid Presence inflammatory process , clinically significant infection 4 week Clinically significant renal , hepatic , cardiac , autoimmune disease Current use immunosuppressant medication hydroxychloroquine , methotrexate azathioprine Inability read comprehend write information provide Current use medication know affect TLR responsiveness include amitriptyline minocycline Current use analgesic , include nonsteroidal antiinflammatory medication opioids 5 drug halflives prior day test Current previous pregnancy Body Mass index less 18 30
